definition: abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: Former call he now have defiled my only self-esteem.
sentences.chinese: 昔日称兄道弟的他现在竟玷污了我唯一的自尊。

sentences.english: It is not hard to see the reasons for celebrating the end of the line for has-been leaders.
sentences.chinese: 对昔日领导人的末日进行庆祝的原因并不难理解。

sentences.english: In my old griefs, and with my childhood's faith.
sentences.chinese: 爱你，以昔日的剧痛和童年的忠诚。

sentences.english: The hotel has been redecorated, but it lost a lot of it's style.
sentences.chinese: 旅馆已重新装修，但昔日优雅格调所剩不多。

sentences.english: In the wake of the scandal, the senator's one-time adherents quietly deserted him.
sentences.chinese: 因为丑闻，该参议院昔日的追随者悄然弃他而去。

sentences.english: At the banquet table, I had the good fortune to sit vis-a-vis an old school chum.
sentences.chinese: 我有幸和一位昔日的老校友坐在宴会桌的对面。

sentences.english: Would it be possible to rebuild and perhaps restore Cybertron to its former glory?
sentences.chinese: 塞伯坦能够得以重建，复兴昔日的辉煌吗？

sentences.english: Still, traces of charm and bygone ambition survive.
sentences.chinese: 象征昔日魅力及抱负的遗迹尚存。

sentences.english: The former as a target of mountainside depressions, now has established a milepost.
sentences.chinese: 那昔日当作目标的山腰洼地，而今已树立起里程碑。

sentences.english: Song Errui of wife of Yao far newly-married is Jin Rui in former days lover.
sentences.chinese: 姚远新婚妻子宋而瑞是金锐的昔日恋人。

sentences.english: In the Autumn of stop to think about revisiting past through time and space.
sentences.chinese: 在秋光中停留，多想穿越时空昔日重游。

sentences.english: For auld lang syne, my dear.
sentences.chinese: 为了昔日美好的时光，亲爱的。

sentences.english: The parade features marchers in elaborate and expensive costumes.
sentences.chinese: 今日费城的化装游行依然保留着昔日的部分特色。

sentences.english: When saw those phot I could't help but remember the past good days before.
sentences.chinese: 看到那些照片，我不禁想起美好的昔日时光。

sentences.english: The current extent of mangroves is probably half of what once existed.
sentences.chinese: 目前红树林覆盖的范围也许是昔日存在的一半。

sentences.english: The south side of old Hsi-Kou Station. 1968.
sentences.chinese: 南下列车驶离昔日的旧溪口站南端。

definition: things change with the passage of time (idiom)
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
just a while before/not so long ago/everyone can remember when..
things have remained the same, but people have changed
